import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=_ref=>{let{setUser}=_ref;const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=e=>{e.preventDefault();// Получаем список пользователей из localStorage
